Interface ImageLoaderManager

    public interface ImageLoaderManager

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveBitmap

        android.graphics.Bitmap retrieveBitmap(java.lang.String url)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches a Bitmap from a remote location and returns it. This method isn't asynchronous, for async image loading you should use #postImage(ImageReference) instead.
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
